titleStmt.title: The address of the Lord Mayor, Aldermen, and Common-Council of the city of London, to the Lords spiritual and temporal in Parliament with the answer thereunto, delivered by the Lord Marquis of Halifax, Lord Privy-Seal, and Speaker of the House of Lords.
titleStmt.author: City of London (England). Court of Common Council.

titleStmt.title: The address of the Lord Mayor, Aldermen, and Common-Council of the city of London, to the Lords spiritual and temporal in Parliament with the answer thereunto, delivered by the Lord Marquis of Halifax, Lord Privy-Seal, and Speaker of the House of Lords.
titleStmt.author: City of London (England). Court of Common Council.
England and Wales. Parliament. House of Lords.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by James Partridge, Matthew Gillyflower, and Samuel Heyrick ...,

notesStmt.note: The address, in support of William, is dated March 8, 1688, and is countersigned "by order of Common-Council". The reply and order to print are both dated 12 March 1688.
This item appears at reel 767:49 as Wing L2868 (number cancelled in Wing 2nd ed.) and at reel 1637:40 as Wing L2859C.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
